get.name: should return empty string if cookie string is null
should return empty string if cookie key is not a string
should return value if cookie string is right
should return empty string if cookie string is wrong

set.name: should set cookie by specified parameters
expectedStrings: some=value; Max-Age=100; Expires=Tue, 23 Feb 2016 19:57:16 GMT; Path=/some; Domain=.new.domain; Secure; HttpOnly

set.name: should set cookies by specified list of parameters
expectedStrings: some1=value1; Max-Age=100; Expires=Tue, 23 Feb 2016 19:57:16 GMT; Path=/some1; Domain=.new.domain1; Secure; HttpOnly
some2=value2; Max-Age=200; Expires=Tue, 23 Feb 2016 20:57:16 GMT; Path=/some2; Domain=.new.domain2; Secure; HttpOnly
